translations: 用肘击打（某人）；用肘推挤，用手肘推开；对……置之不理（elbow 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 肘部发炎；网球运动员常见的肘伤

sentences.sentence: He elbowed his way through the crowd.
sentences.translation: 他用手肘从人群中挤了过去。

sentences.sentence: She elbowed me out of the way to get to the front of the line.
sentences.translation: 她用肘部把我推开朝队伍前面挤。

sentences.sentence: They also claim that the security team elbowed aside a steward.
sentences.translation: 他们还声称治安队把一名乘务员推到了一边。
